text: ramajana se'i maha, yi mahata kora'ana aratirna karaa haiche manara jatira hidayatara babe arau hidayatara spasta nidarsana arau satya-asatyara parthakyakarairaupe.Eteke tomalokara majata yiye e'i mahata upanita haâ€™ba si yena e'i mahata chiyama palana karae. Kintu tomalokara konoba'i asustha thakile athaba bhramanarasthata thakile belega dinaborata e'i sankhya purana karaiba. Allahe tomalokara babe sahajato bicarae arau tomalokara babe kasta nibicarae, yate tomaloke sankhya purna karaa arau te'om tomalokaka ye hidayata diche se'i babe tomaloke allahara mahima ghosana karaa arau yate tomaloke krtajnata prakasa karaa
